scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run testonly
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel --ignore __tests__ -d dist src && npm run build-dot-flow
scripts.build-dot-flow: find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__tests__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo $filepath | sed 's/\/src\//\/dist\//g'`.flow; done
